User wait states Pointers to related or more detailed performance data can be found on displays marked with an asterisk (*). 390 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 12.3 Collecting and using raw CP monitor data Although the Performance Toolkit formats and displays current performance data, it is often necessary to look at older data also.
